column2: "Juda na wohun Nyankopɔn: Ne dzin so wɔ Israel."
"Hɔ na obubuu egyen no n'egyen menaba mu; Kyɛm no
"Ɔwo yɛ onyimnyamfo na abɔso sen afonam mbepɔw no mpo."

column4: Na akatakyi no mu biara ennhu hɔn nsa."
Na tseaseanam na ɔpɔnkɔ nyina atotɔ nda heii."
na wo ho yɛ hu: Na sɛ wo bo nya fuw a

column2: "Ɔwo ma wɔtse atsɛmbu fi sor; Asaase suroi
"Aber a Nyankopɔn soɛɛr dɛ orubobu atsɛn
column3: Dɛ ɔbɛgye hɔn a wɔdwe wɔ asaase do nyinara nkwa no."

column2: "Ampaara nyimpa n'ebufuw beyi wo ayɛw: Na ebufuw nkaase no ɔwo besianka."

column3: na hom ntua mma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn: Wɔmma hɔn a wɔabɔ no ho aprɔw nyinara mfa akyɛdze mbra nyia no ho yɛ hu no."

column2: "Nyia otwa asafohemfo sunsum kyen: No ho yɛ hu ma asaase do ahemfo."
